data.text: @jj_callaghan We're sorry for the inconvenience, Jonathan. Please note that it may take longer than usual to process your refund due to the COVID outbreak. We humbly suggest that you follow up on your concern through the Email. [1/2]

@jj_callaghan We are committed to helping all our passengers in the best possible way. Due to high pressure on our customer service, our processing time for travel vouchers and refunds is longer than normal.

@CollierSwecker We understand your frustration and would like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may be causing you. However, after our related department has done the process of investigation, they will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.

@CollierSwecker Due to the high volume of incoming requests, we seek your kind understanding and patience that our colleagues may take longer than usual to respond to you. Rest assured that they will be in touch once they are able to. Once again, we're sorry for the inconvenience.

@CollierSwecker In this case, we would like to suggest that you contact our Thai Airways office in your city of departure at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR or contact net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com for further assistance.
@CollierSwecker May we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@CollierSwecker We understand that this can cause some inconvenience for you, but we thank you for your patience and understanding. [2/2]

@CollierSwecker We are committed to helping all our passengers in the best possible way. Due to high pressure on our customer service, our processing time for travel vouchers and refunds is longer than normal. [1/2]

@soitskathy Greetings, how may we be of assistance?

@RajpalAhlawat2 Greetings. We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.
@MattClarke2 Please provide us the detail via Direct Message.

@NicMacDods Passengers who booked their tickets through travel agencies are advised to contact their agents for assistance. Those who booked through Thai Airways may contact THAI contact center +662-356-1111 (24 hrs) or contact THAI Ticketing Offices at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR.
@Intanayuningru1 Yes, you can. However, if you choose option 1, you have to contact the travel agency to rebook. Kindly read all conditions carefully.

@Intanayuningru1 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through a travel agency, you have to contact the agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@Intanayuningru1 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@purplea16347327 Greetings, may we contact you via DM?

@Kat_Trinaaa THAI is undergoing rehabilitation through the Central Bankruptcy Court and therefore is temporarily unable to provide a refund on those tickets. Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.
@rahulvig261 We suggest that you contact our email contact@service.thaiairways.com
@rahulvig261 Rest assured, we are doing the best we can to accommodate everyone. Thank you, and we're hoping for your kind understanding.

data.text: @1961andallthat We're sorry for the inconvenience, Steve. Please note that it may take longer than usual to process your refund due to the COVID outbreak. Rest assured, we are doing the best we can to accommodate everyone. Thank you, and we're hoping for your kind understanding.
@TucoMr We do apologize for the inconvenience. As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. They will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.

@IZXRI Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through a travel agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket. We do apologize for the inconvenience.

@intissa99975621 @MisterFly_fr We understand that you've already submitted your refund request. We seek your patience as our colleagues work to process the large number of requests and queries received during this time. Thank you.
@RickBar83192380 We invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise.
@aeroAdvocate Greetings, we will notify you of the information as soon as there are updates. In the case that flights are canceled, the notification of cancellation will be sent to your e-mail.
@Susnaata1 Further information on the refund process and the Company’s rehabilitation will be provided soon.
@AroraTush We already reply to you by DM.

@thillcope We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
